participants.name: Mark Farlin

messages.message:
https://theoutline.com/post/1166/programmers-are-confessing-their-coding-sins-to-protest-a-broken-job-interview-process

Last time I interviewed at your company I got a whiteboard interview. Interesting I am not the only one that sees this as a problem.
